import React, { useState } from 'react'; const ExpenseForm = () => { const [enteredTitle, setEnteredTitle] = useState('') const [enteredAmount, setEnteredAmount] = useState('') const [enteredDate, setEnteredDate] = useState('') const titleChangeHandler = (event) => { setEnteredTitle(event.target.value) } return
} export default ExpenseForm;
